titles.header: An image of the person behind the resume within 30 seconds
titles.subheader: Video recording and playback functionality completely integrated into your recruitment proces and system

features_1.title: Benefits of video
features_1.subtitle: in the recruitment process
features_1.feature1: Receive a first impression of candidates early in the process
features_1.feature2: Give candidates an extra resource to distinguish themselves
features_1.feature3: Do not assess candidates solely based on hard criteria, but also on soft skills
features_1.feature4: Recruit more efficiently by involving the vacancy-holder in the process
features_1.feature6: Increase the quality of first acquaintances
features_1.feature7: Presenteer kandidaten op een onderscheidende manier aan opdrachtgevers of lijnmanagers

features_2.title: You decide where, how and when
features_2.feature1_desc: Video is an effective resource for a lot of procedures, yet not relevant for every vacancy. You decide for which procedure you want to use video.
features_2.feature2_desc: Video can be used in several stages of the application process.  You can decide, per vacancy, where it has the most value: in the application form, instantly after an application, before or after a first acquaintance or in addition to the presentation to a vacancy-holder.
features_2.feature3_desc: You can apply video in different ways. You can ask candidates one or several questions, present them a case or simply ask them to motivate why they want to work with you.

features_3.title: Where does video fit in your recruitment process?
features_3.feature1_desc: Give applicants the possibility to distinguish themselves from others
features_3.feature4_header: In the presentation to a vacancy-holder
features_3.feature4_desc: Present the best candidates to the vacancy-holder via video

features_4.title: Why Flipbase?
features_4.feature1_desc: Both video recording and playback are fully integrated into your current recruitment environment. You do not need to login to another system to use Flipbase.
features_4.feature2_header: Use video within your current workflow
features_4.feature2_desc: With one click you can invite one or several candidates to record a video. In this process you can ask them a specific question or give them an assignment.
features_4.feature3_header: Directly accessible within your recruitment system
features_4.feature3_desc: The recorded videos will automatically end up in the correct candidate profile within your current recruitment environment. In the candidate profile you can directly playback the video and if applicable, share it with colleagues
features_4.feature4_desc: Candidates and recruiters do not need to download software or apps to record or playback videos. Both the Flipbase recording and playback functionality are accessible online in every (online) browser.

features_5.feature2_desc: Both the recording and playback functionality are fully responsive and thus easy to access and use on a smartphone or tablet.
features_5.feature3_desc: Users have several options to send their video: via webcam, by using the camera on a smartphone/tablet or by uploading a video.
features_5.feature4_desc: Change the maximum recording time from 30 seconds to a maximum of 3 minutes. We advice 30 seconds, but give you the possibility to adjust it.
features_5.feature5_desc: Ranging from Dutch to Chinese, we support every language. The language can automatically be adjusted based on the browser settings.
